trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os itens da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when the list is being cleared.
trans-unit.target: A classe base chama este método quando a lista está a ser desmarcada.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação gera o <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A>método da <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>classe base.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is added or removed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um item é adicionado ou removido.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty and non-modifiable instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância vazia e não modificável de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere um item na coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A classe base chama este método quando um item é adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação gera o <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A>método da <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>classe base.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where the `item` is inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero onde o `item` é inserido.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a inserir.

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o item no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: A classe base chama este método quando um item é removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação gera o <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A>método da <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>classe base.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do elemento para remover.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o elemento no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A classe base chama este método quando está definido um item na coleção.

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação gera o <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A>método da <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>classe base.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to replace.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do elemento para substituir.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor para o elemento no índice especificado.
